title: Only  one flaw
comment: I use this app all the time for recording music and voice in rehearsal situations. The only thing I would want added is a button to mute the mic. This would allow  you too record all the lines in a show except your own, but leave the time in the recording..it could be used at a table read and you'd never have to find someone to run lines with again.

title: Randomly recording
comment: (same review as one for Sound Recorder) 3 times now I've looked down at my locked phone to see this app recording the dead air. Not sure why it's randomly recording but that's a good reason to uninstall. Phone is locked in my back pocket while I'm walking around. Is there a shortcut while locked I don't know about? Kinda freaky. Otherwise it's good but random recording is bad. That gets fixed it's 5 stars.

title: Not Rehearsal App anymore?
comment: Sooooo this no longer is for learning lines? Where did my saved projects go?? This sucks, sucks i just started recommending this app to people.

title: Excellent
comment: Nice app. Very good sound quality with the high quality settings. Use it to record narration and doesn't need much post processing. Don't know why some are having problems. Used this on my old htc desire and new moto. It has always worked excellently.
Good. :)

title: Records voice fine.  Edit audio? Forget it!
comment: This works OK.  I don't understand the link to Ringdroid.   Surely there are simpler ways to record ringtones.   You cannot edit the audio in Ringdroid and save it back to Rehearsal Assistant.  What's the point of that?   It would be a fantastic feature to tighten up audio clips or take out flubs.   Also, forget about editing the audio files in anything.   As soon as you edit an audio clip outside Rehearsal Assistant, your project sequence is broken and no longer works.  Bad design.
Works great

title: Excellent.
comment: Great App. Best Sound Recorder. Simple. Functional. Open Source. No Ads. Galaxy Tab.

title: Excellent!!!!!
comment: Great App. Use wav setting uncompressed. Amazing!!!! Droid DNA.
Sex

title: It cuts up the recordings into useless shreds!
comment: The older versions were fine, this is GARBAGE!!! I record a 5 minute song and it ends up being a 3 1/2 minute song where every 15 seconds or so it completely skips to a later part in the song.  I'm looking for a replacement for this program now!

title: galaxy s 2
comment: needs better recording features
I love this recorder. I constantly write songs and take song notes with it.

title: Do not trust this app
comment: I just got burned for the last time with this. Recording fails frequently. Calls can stop it so I even put the phone in airplane mode, which worked before but still, just lost an important recording.

title: Wow!
comment: The first app that I've come across allowing for audio sample and bit rate settings! Thank you :-)

title: Crystal clear
comment: The record in WAVE format is great. I used this to record 50 min lectures in WAVE format for crystal clear playback. I recorded many lectures and because of the great quality i was even able to hear the quiet bits by turning volume up. And putting a shortcut on home screen allows quick 2 touch recording. Doesn't need widget. But a multi select option would be good. Deleting many files is tedious. Brilliant free app.

title: It crashes for uncompressed recording
comment: It always crashes on high quality uncompressed recording On galaxy s3, plz fix if possible, that's the only reason I download this application. I will update the rating once it is fixed,  if soon.

title: Amazing App
comment: I am a musician. This app makes recording guitar riffs, melodies, gingles and other noteable ideas incredibly quick and easy! Its one of my favorites. I can record for hours.
5 stars if it stops sending two emails/files and supports more formats. Other than that, smooth man!
Its really good for me I do music and this was likea diamond in the ruff when it came to recording apps my only problem is that its a batter killer:(

title: Great, but needs better file management.
comment: I love this app! 5 stars when renaming projects and moving recordings between sessions becomes a thing I can do.

title: Excellent
comment: Really good open source voice recorder for Android

title: Yes
comment: This app is fantastic for recording my riffs when I'm jamming at home.   Turn the .wav setting on in settings to turn off compression.   It does the job great.  I can't say enough how awesome this app is.

title: Much worse than default voice recorder
comment: Im using galaxy note and this app is much worse than the default recorder. Cant hear anything if used for recording lecture or seminar.

title: I am a singer!
comment: This app has been very useful for rehearsals. Able share recordings via email or text.

title: As a musician...
comment: ... this app has helped me in so many ways that I can't even begin to list them all!!!  In addition to songwriting, I can record meetings, and even use it to record phone calls when necessary just by putting my home phone on speaker.    The email feature is priceless!  I'm able to shoot song samples and changes to producers effortlessly.   If I could give it 10 stars, I would!  if they figure out how to record in call phone calls, this app the ONLY app i would pay for!

title: Works fine, intuitive, DroidX.
comment: I gave 4 stars vs 5 because I would like to see a quick backspace feature added. If I'm learning lines, I may want to jump back a little, doing so with the slider is awkward. An A-B repeat feature would also be a great enhancement, maybe on a Pro version. I'd pay a reasonable fee for it.

title: Works well DroidX.
comment: Simple, works.

title: Great app
comment: Very convenient and useful!
Sound quality is great! Wish it would not force close and lose data!

title: Excellent voice recorder
comment: I tried plenty of other apps looking for a good simple recorder that would record with the screen off. This is the best one I found, and it is both free and ad-free. Thanks to the devs!

title: Stops when I get text messages
comment: Also doesnt save the file after the interruption so I lose everything recorded.

title: Used t work - now just force closes
comment: I used to love this app and recorded important meetings and could listen to them wiith no problem.  Now every time I try to listen to one of the recordings it force closes.  I can't listen to any of my recordings and I had some very important stuff on there.  I think I have lost it all.  I wish I had transcribed everything right after I recorded it because now I think I've lost everything.  Can someone tell me the developer's email?  I can only get it through Outlook and I don't use Outlook.
Not optimized for HD devices and tablets
So so quality
Amazing sound quality compared to stock voice recorder on htc.

title: Good
comment: Needs to boost quality of compression. On WAV q is good. Mic volume wld be good, but level is ok.

title: Great with one problem
comment: This is the best voice recorder I have used by a long shot. My only complaint is that it is granted one permission which is not disclosed. "Read phone state and identity". At first this seemed scary until I looked it up. It's obviously there to prevent it from interfering with phone calls, but the "and identity"part is still cause for alarm in some cases. I would point out though that it is an "all our none" permission. Still, I wouldn't have had a panic attack at all if this permission were disclosed.

title: Good idea, but not for me.
comment: does not record flute, piccolo, or other high pitches well.
Wow good quality im impressed. i didnt xpcted it but no pause! come on! sigh! could be great

title: Droid 3 application problems
comment: I've used this app for some time with 100% satisfaction. However, since upgrading my phone to the new version consistent issues occur with the app force closing and restarting my phone losing the ongoing recording. I turned on the lock screen feature with no effect. Please fix. It was a highly utilized 5 star app before. Thank you

title: Great for recording lectures
comment: Use it in school to record lectures. Awesome range; oftentimes the people I am recording are 10-15 feet away. Leaves nothing to be desired. Perfect for what I need it for. DROID X
Great app.  Very useful and good quality.   Notes are very helpful.
Great app you bust out and record on for some accoustic jams. Recording quality and playback is phenomenal (once you turn .wav recording on.

title: Crashed on first use
comment: Could record but no play back

title: Useful app
comment: Use it in rehearsals to take tech notes for later....just wish I didn't have so many notes to take! ;-)

title: Great app!
comment: Makes memorizing scripts so easy! I love it!

title: Bass Player
comment: Its cool...I understand u can't do much with the sound quality but, its free!!!

comment: Crashes when record button pressed. D2G.

title: Bummer
comment: Terrible sound quality
Can't email
I can do this with the built in voice recording program. Fluff.

title: quick recording clips made easy
comment: love it . it is really easy

title: Rules!!
comment: Great app
Pro: grouping Con: nothing special

title: Converting The Compressed Audio
comment: I was really pleased with my test recording of a barbershop chorus CD from my stereo to the uncompressed wav with lots of harmonic layers and dynamics captured and so I used the app to record our chorus but was rushing and accidently unselected the uncompress option. Surprsingly the compressed option wasn't bad and didn't distort when loud but I had to upload it to my computer then convert the compressed 3gp audio to share it and found a good free program called simply, 3GP to MP3 Converter from Shiver.
Without being able to control the input level, all loud music sounds distorted.
Doesn't support switching to a new phone. Waist of good recordings
Add support for qhd screen please
Definitely the best sounding recording because of .wav format but no pause button while recording . . . Really? even after all these years?
The sound quality is not bad, but it skips a lot!
works for me, just what i'm looking for Droid global
The quality is SUPERBBBBBBBBBB!
Perfect

title: Uncompressed audio not working (LG ALly)
comment: LG Ally, stock 2.2.1. Regular mode works. But when "Record Uncompressed Audio" enabled, recording seems to take place, but when I try to playback the file (within the app), get an error "Prepare Failed.: Status=0xFFFFFFFF. Looking at the recorded files on a computer (WinXP), all files are the same size (44bytes) regardless of how long the recording was for, and they do not play in WMP.
Love recording my kids and being able to send audio right to grandparents, or converting to ringtones.
It's making it force close after I record! (Droid incredible) Fix please then more stars.
The phone's (htc eris) preinstalled non-removable apps couldn't produce but garbled recordings in comparison to Rehearsal Assistant. Uncompressed wav!
Good 4 samples. Audio waveform outline could be drawn in red if clipping and peaking!
Nice recorder with good quality, been usin it a while and its good for musicians, i find it usefull to record fresh lyrics so you dont forget later.
Good quality recordings. Easy to record, upload and listen to. Best recorder for lectures so far. Droid X.
Worked good at first then started crashing everytime i tried to record
Never had a recorder with such a great quality as this. Will be using for song writing for sure. Droid X.
Much better audio quality with uncompressed setting. Please make app with this level of audio quality for camcorder!!!
Error when recording uncompressed wave. Looks like its recording but when attempting play back error message states it could prepare file. Help.
Nice app, picks up audio very well
Great app, when recording uncompressed, the quality is remarkable.
Great. I use this for recording quick reminders in the car or whenever I'm on the go. Reliable and user friendly.

Voice Memo Was searching for an Android app to use as a voice memo recorder. Won't be as good as my Palm Tungsten T3, which had a dedicated hardware button I could use to record a memo while driving without looking at the device. Or my Treo, where I could likewise press and hold a button to record. But very nice for what it does. A bit hard to see the difference between recordings you've played (normal text) and ones you haven't (bold) - perhaps adding italics to one or the other, or some other marker, would help.
Love the sound quality... Wish it had a pause button. Now, i have to test it in class:)
Fantastic, uncompressed very nice. Can't best the price.
Just amazing! Change the sound quality to"un compressed" and it works like a charm. I use it in school when voice recorders are not allowed. Lol
In response to the negative feedback about sound quality: there is a high quality setting which allows you to record uncompressed.
Did great at first, then abruptly stopped. Zio user
Well done app. Would be in love with it if I could adjust recording levels.
Works an sounds great...and great for podcasting
playback is crystal clear and love the fact that I can play in the background, that is always a plus -droid x-
